name: Colorless (EmiliaBornschlegl)
description:
Colorless is set in a gray dream world within the memories of a young child who was taught to suppress their own feelings.
The reason for this can be found in the story behind the characters, which deals with war and relationships with one another.

Explore the setting, interact with various objects and solve puzzles to further uncover the story while bringing back all the colors to escape the dream world.

Credits:

  • Auer Celina (3D-Artist & Story-Lead)
  • Bornschlegl Emilia (3D-Artist)
  • Guggenberger Florian (Sound-Designer & Music-Composer)
  • Reichl Lisa (3D-Artist & Interface-Designer)
  • Waigmann Thorsten (Programmer)
